action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Fallen Warrior Battlefield Cross Memorial Act of 2019
This bill provides that the Department of Veterans Affairs may not prohibit the display of a Battlefield Cross in any national cemetery.
A Battlefield Cross is a memorial monument in honor of deceased members of the Armed Forces.
